subject: Football
Snow and Snowstorms
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. considered ease of travel for Bills fans and tried to preserve some of the team’s geographic advantage before moving the game against the Jets to Detroit from Buffalo on Monday night.
snippet: The N.F.L. considered ease of travel for Bills fans and tried to preserve some of the team’s geographic advantage before moving the game against the Jets to Detroit from Buffalo on Monday night.
